title: Is Apple Watch Ultra Too Big to Daily?

media:group.media:title: Is Apple Watch Ultra Too Big to Daily?
media:group.media:description:
I'm almost sold on the idea of the Apple Watch Ultra but I am slightly on the fence about its size. Will it just feel too big to wear day to day?

In this video I compare the Apple Watch Ultra with my Apple Watch Series 5 to see just how much bigger it feels and looks. 

Many thanks to the Apple Store in Bath for being very accommodating with their filming policy. (I was allowed to film the device but not customers, staff or audio, which I felt was more than reasonable so I'm very grateful for that). 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
